citations.narrative:
At the time of the inspection on January 15, 2025 the facility had not submitted to USDA’s Animal Care Deputy
Administrator a 2024 Fiscal Year annual report detailing its live animal use in research, tests, experiments, or teaching.
Properly identifying species and number of animals held and/or used for research, tests, experiments, or teaching is
necessary to inform the Institutional Official and USDA Animal Care of the scope of animal use at the facility.
Correct by January 22, 2025 by submitting the 2024 Fiscal Year Annual Report to Animal Care’s Deputy Administrator.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative.
n

narrative:
2.36(a) 
   
Annual report. 
At the time of the inspection on January 15, 2025 the facility had not submitted to USDA’s Animal Care Deputy 
Administrator a 2024 Fiscal Year annual report detailing its live animal use in research, tests, experiments, or teaching. 
Properly identifying species and number of animals held and/or used for research, tests, experiments, or teaching is 
necessary to inform the Institutional Official and USDA Animal Care of the scope of animal use at the facility. 
 
Correct by January 22, 2025 by submitting the 2024 Fiscal Year Annual Report to Animal Care’s Deputy Administrator. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative. 
 
 n
